key_risk_themes: ["Complex System Integration & Dependencies","Operational Readiness & Deployment Complexity","Core Feature Scalability & Security"]
immediate_actions_required: ["Conduct a technical spike to load test the Feed Service 'fan-out-on-write' pattern for 'super-node' scenarios.","Schedule a third-party penetration test and mandate security-focused code reviews for all auth-related pull requests.","Develop a shared OpenTelemetry library to enforce consistent observability instrumentation across all microservices."]
